oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Copy print of Spencer Samuel Ferguson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A print copy of a photograph of Spencer Samuel Ferguson. He appears to be wearing the cotton khaki summer uniform with campaign hat. It appears that he has staff sergeant rank insignia on his right sleeve. The photo was probably taken at a stateside training camp. It may be that this image is post war as he was promoted to corporal in July 1920. Ferguson served in the Ordnance Department and was from Hickman County, Tennessee.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Ferguson, Spencer Samuel
World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
